jsondiscoverer.web

Class JsonSimpleDiscovererServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • jsondiscoverer.web.AbstractJsonDiscoverer
          • jsondiscoverer.web.JsonSimpleDiscovererServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/simpleDiscoverMetamodel")
public class JsonSimpleDiscovererServlet
extends AbstractJsonDiscoverer
    Servlet providing providing access to JsonSimpleDiscoverer.

    The servlet answers to POST HTTP calls. Receives as input a JSON document from which a metamodel is discovered. The discovered metamodel is returned as both image and xmi, both of them encoded as base64.

    Author:
    Javier Canovas (me@jlcanovas.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • doPost

        protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Performs a POST call to this servlet.

        Receives a JSON document (in the parameter set in AbstractJsonDiscoverer.jsonParam)

        Discovers a metamodel (using JsonSimpleDiscoverer) and returns two params:

        • An image of the metamodel encoded in base64
        • The XMI of the metamodel encoded as base64

        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - The Request of the call
        response - The Response to the call
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        HttpServlet.doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse)

      • discoverMetamodel

        private org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage discoverMetamodel(java.lang.String jsonCode)
                                                  throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Discover a metamodel from a JSON document.

        THe method uses JsonSimpleDiscoverer to discover the metamodel (as EPackage)

        Parameters:
        jsonCode - The JSON document
        Returns:
        The Epackage The metamodel
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - Usually triggered with IO-related issues

      • convertToImage

        private java.io.File convertToImage(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage ePackage)
                             throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Converts a EPackage into a picture and saves it in disk.

        The method relies on AbstractJsonDiscoverer.drawModel(List, String)

        Parameters:
        ePackage - The metamodel
        Returns:
        The file with the picture
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - Something went wrong doing IO things

      • discoverMetamodelBase64

        private java.lang.String discoverMetamodelBase64(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage ePackage)
                                          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Performs the discovery and returns a picture encoded in BASE64 with the picture representing the discovered metamodel

        The method relies on convertToImage(EPackage) and AbstractJsonDiscoverer.encodeToString(File)

        Parameters:
        ePackage - The metamodel
        Returns:
        A String encoded in base64 representing the picture of the metamodel
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - Something went wrong with IO
